document_data.name: Adreen
document_data.mainbody: '''Adreen''' was a [[human]] merchant in [[Mantol-Derith]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Adreen usually sold exotic pets. She normally danced around her stall, talking and singing to the animals. She normally sold nothing however.
document_data.Personality: Adreen seemed totally oblivious to the dangers of the [[Underdark]], and she did not really care about selling anything.
